questions.text: What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
questions.explanation: Au comes from the Latin word for gold, 'Aurum'.

questions.text: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars appears red due to iron oxide on its surface.

questions.text: What is the hardest natural substance on Earth?
questions.explanation: Diamond is the hardest known natural material.

questions.text: What is the largest organ in the human body?
questions.explanation: The skin is the body's largest organ.

questions.text: What gas do plants absorb from the atmosphere?
questions.explanation: Plants absorb Carbon Dioxide for photosynthesis.
